channel.title: Showing off
channel.description:
[b]Features:[/b]
All on a website, with mySQL hooked up.
- Change any file with the built in editor - Create an npc and spawn it without restarting the server - Compile the server - Stop or start the server - Check logs, check players - Change player rights - Able to restart successfully - Server status checker
[img]http://img01.picoodle.com/img/img01/3/9/29/f_m_e646f26.png[/img]
[img]http://img32.picoodle.com/img/img32/3/9/29/f_m_741f15b.png[/img]
[img]http://img02.picoodle.com/img/img02/3/9/29/f_m_e5fa077.png[/img]

item.title: Showing off
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Adam Adam
item.description:
@Mod_Adam wrote:

[quote=“JuzEh, post:9, topic:234003”][quote author=Adam link=topic=308514.msg2466441#msg2466441 date=1222735019]
Not really I guess ^ Sorry
[/quote]

I assume you can make something better?

Nice work though, looks like it’s coming along good :P.[/quote]
Ummmm, ya. I’m preeeeetty sure I could.

Read full topic

item.title: Showing off
item.dc:creator: @Razr1 Razr`
item.description:
@Razr1 wrote:

[quote=“bigh51, post:7, topic:234003”][quote author=Razr` link=topic=308514.msg2466451#msg2466451 date=1222735287]
For these tasks my IDE is better I guess …

No wait that’s for sure.
[/quote]Somehow I doubt you have your own ide, when you think “I made a code” makes sense.[/quote]

You make code, but you don’t code things.

Somehow I doubt you know what IDE stands for, and don’t bother googling it.

Read full topic

item.title: Showing off
item.dc:creator: @JuzEh JuzEh
item.description:
@JuzEh wrote:

Yz85Racer:

Yes but without the love for it, it does not present the eater that bliss.

Hehe, I guess :P.

item.title: Showing off
item.dc:creator: @Project_Revolution Project Revolution
item.description:
@Project_Revolution wrote:

[quote=“Yz85Racer, post:13, topic:234003”][quote author=Project Revolution link=topic=308514.msg2466601#msg2466601 date=1222740273]

That doesn’t look like it’d be that hard, and from what I can see in the first few lines, the code is ugly, unorganized, and represents spaghetti.
[/quote]Yz Has Spoken…

Anyways, better than what I could do seing as I’m not one of them web design peoples ot whatever…

I don’t see what web design had to do with this…

That doesn’t look like it’d be that hard, and from what I can see in the first few lines, the code is ugly, unorganized, and represents spaghetti.

Even though spaghetti’s ugly, it’s still tasty :P.

Yes but without the love for it, it does not present the eater that bliss.[/quote]

That just proves my point…

I CAN’T DO IT!

Read full topic

Features:

All on a website, with mySQL hooked up.

  • Change any file with the built in editor
  • Create an npc and spawn it without restarting the server
  • Compile the server
  • Stop or start the server
  • Check logs, check players
  • Change player rights
  • Able to restart successfully
  • Server status checker
